title: Velveeta Cheesy Broccoli Soup Recipe
description: This Velveeta broccoli cheese soup recipe is the real deal and ready in less than 30 minutes. Easy and satisfying comfort food everyone will love.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Everyday Cooking Velveeta Cheesy Broccoli Soup 4.7 (87) 78 Reviews 27 Photos This Velveeta broccoli cheese soup recipe is the real deal. Pinch yourself. You're not dreaming. This thick, creamy broccoli Cheddar soup is ready in less than 30 minutes. Submitted by VELVEETA Cheese Updated on October 31, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 27 27 27 27 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 15 mins Total Time: 25 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 2 tablespoons butter or margarine ¼ cup chopped onion 2 tablespoons flour 2 ½ cups milk ¾ pound VELVEETA®, cut up 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed, drained ⅛ teaspoon pepper Directions Melt butter in a large saucepan on medium heat. Add onion; cook and stir until onion is tender, about 5 minutes. Add flour; cook 1 minute or until bubbly, stirring constantly. Stir in milk. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer for 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients; Velveeta cheese, broccoli, and pepper. Cook until cheese is melted and soup is heated through, stirring occasionally. To Make in the Microwave: Place onion and butter in a 2-quart microwaveable casserole dish or bowl. Microwave on high until onion is tender, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients; mix well. Microwave on high until Velveeta is melted and soup is heated through, 6 to 8 minutes, stirring after 4 minutes. Recipe Tips You can substitute frozen chopped spinach, frozen cauliflower (chopped), or frozen asparagus spears (chopped) for broccoli.For a lighter variation, use 2% milk Velveeta and save 50 calories, 6 grams of fat, and 4 grams of saturated fat per serving. I Made It Print 220 home cooks made it! If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Velveeta Cheesy Broccoli Soup 01 of 27 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 27 Photo by  cityrose 02/24/2023 I'm gonna be honest I glanced over the recipe for base measurements. Added garlic before flour. Diced carrots and celery, added whole brocolli florets. Some better than bullion as needed. Used my immersion blender then added smaller cut florets with velveeta to simer and finish off. Absolutely heaven 03 of 27 Photo by  Patty B 04/08/2022 Very good. Just used lowfat milk 04 of 27 Photo by  Rebekah45 08/31/2020 05 of 27 Photo by  Bess Newton 03/27/2020 Very good and super easy! 06 of 27 Photo by  1908Cubfan 01/19/2020 I used fresh brocoli and unsweetened coconut milk. Added a little smoked paprika. Delicious. Thanks for the recipe. 07 of 27 Photo by  Amy Collin 12/24/2019 08 of 27 Photo by  Kortney Colson 12/10/2019 09 of 27 Photo by  Janice W 11/22/2019 wowwwwww 10 of 27 Photo by  Renise Baulden 09/23/2019 1 2 3 Next You’ll Also Love Cheesy Broccoli and Vegetable Soup 73 Ratings Slow Cooker Cream of Broccoli Soup 42 Ratings Gouda and Broccoli Soup 11 Ratings Slow Cooker Cheesy Broccoli Soup 2 Ratings Potato, Broccoli, and Cheese Soup 5 Ratings Mom's Broccoli Cheese Soup 13 Ratings Erin's Cheesy Broccoli Soup 186 Ratings Low Carb Broccoli Soup 10 Ratings The Real Copycat Panera Broccoli Cheddar Soup 25 Ratings Low-Fat, Full-Flavor Cream of Broccoli Soup 73 Ratings Broccoli Soup au Gratin 6 Ratings Gluten-Free Broccoli and Cheese Soup Easiest Broccoli Soup EVER 7 Ratings Best Cream Of Broccoli Soup 1,700 Ratings Cheese Soup with Broccoli 202 Ratings Slow Cooker Broccoli-Cheese Soup 4 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: VELVEETA Cheese
instructions: Melt butter in a large saucepan on medium heat. Add onion; cook and stir until onion is tender, about 5 minutes. Add flour; cook 1 minute or until bubbly, stirring constantly.;Stir in milk. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer for 1 minute.;Add remaining ingredients; Velveeta cheese, broccoli, and pepper. Cook until cheese is melted and soup is heated through, stirring occasionally.
